alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:01AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Phelps and Harlan Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Atlanta to Stamford. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Atlanta around 1205 AM CDT. Holdrege around 1215 AM CDT. Ragan around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Orleans, Alma, Funk and Huntley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
